column6: Follow the continuing adventures of the 1602 versions of Hulk and Spider-Man! Can the Hulk restrain the dread beast he carries within? Will Peter Parquagh be able to learn that with great power comes great responsibility?
column8: | inker:Oclair Albert | letterer:Todd Klein | writer:Greg Pak | penciller:Greg Tocchini | penciller (cover):Sergio Toppi | colorist:Laura Villari
